thought: To craft a loom I need to craft oak planks and place them in a specific pattern on the crafting table. To craft oak planks I need to place 1 stripped_oak_wood in the crafting table. The stripped_oak_wood is currently at slot 17, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1
